title: The speakers give a sizzling sound as if I'm switching radio channels. How can I get rid of that?
content: Ever since I bought the device and I get a weird sound coming out while playing a song or watching a video or even calling someone. I tried restarting the device/restarting the app, but it's as if it wants to make this sound at that particular moment of time. It's not permanent, but it does happen often.
